definition: ATP + Pyridinium-3,5-biscarboxylic acid mononucleotide <=> Diphosphate + 5-Carboxy-1-(5-O-phospho-beta-D-ribofuranosyl)pyridin-1-ium-3-carbonyl adenylate
comment: the first step of three-step reaction (see R12062, R12059+R12060+R12061)
